meanings.definition: The state or quality of being picky or choosy.
meanings.sent1: Her pickinesses when it comes to food make it hard to find a restaurant she likes.
meanings.sent2: His pickinesses in selecting a movie to watch often leads to indecision.
meanings.sent3: The cat's pickinesses in choosing a toy to play with is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The pickinesses of the queen bee in selecting her attendants is well-known in the hive.
meanings.sent5: The pickinesses of the toddler in choosing his bedtime story can be exhausting for his parents.

meanings.definition: The act of being overly selective or fussy.
meanings.sent1: The pickinesses of the customer made it challenging for the waiter to take the order.
meanings.sent2: Her pickinesses in choosing a gift for her friend delayed her shopping trip.
meanings.sent3: The pickinesses of the dog in selecting a spot to nap in the sun is quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The pickinesses of the director in casting the lead role caused delays in the production.
meanings.sent5: The pickinesses of the artist in selecting the perfect shade of blue for the painting was evident in the final masterpiece.
